title: FreeRadical CMS & Oxidly Cloud Platform Architecture
summary: Comprehensive overview of FreeRadical CMS v1.7.0 (high-performance Rust backend) and the Oxidly.com Cloud Platform. Includes backend module summaries (AI/MCP, SEO, E-commerce, Content Management), performance benchmarks, and detailed requirements for the hybrid frontend architecture. Covers pluggable payment architecture, project structure, site and content management implementation details (including full CRUD for pages/posts, relational Module mapping, and Editor Integration), and current implementation progress tracked against the v2.0.0 roadmap.
